website_summaries.verdict: The Keds Triple Kick Shimmer is one of the pumped up reinterpretations given to the ageless silhouette, which gets an extra boost of appeal with its elevated height. Its outer appearance is as riveting as its comfy interior built with a soft, cushioned footbed. Its affordable rate is a come on that’s why many have given this shoe a five-star rating.
pros: Women buyers can’t get enough of the retooled form as its shimmery sole offers a lovely look
A very cozy and cushioned sneaker that’s suitable for all-day walking, inside the shopping malls and along the parks
The pearly, triple-deck sole of the Keds Triple Kick Shimmer offers a nice blush to one’s attire especially during the fall season
Its inlay sole has remarkable, soft padding, noted by many
A comfortable sneaker that isn’t only suitable for casual corporate wear but even for off-work night outs, as stated by several buyers
Several consumers are getting compliments while wearing this shoe as its shiny and pronounced midsole is attractive
A shoe that several reviewers won’t hesitate to recommend to their friends
A few mentioned that their decision to purchase this shoe was perfect as it is comfortable and stylish
Many reviewers can’t help but admire the style of this sneaker
The Keds Triple Kick Shimmer comes with an affordable price tag
cons: It comes in limited colors, said by a few buyers
This pump gets dirty quite easily, mentioned by one reviewer
One purchaser stated her Achilles’ heel got blisters while sporting this shoe

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I totally love this shoes !!! My sister got them for me and they are so cute and confy im a size 8.5 or 9 sometimes I order a size 9 and it fit me perfectly. :) im so happy with my purchased I hope they make different colors and yes I would recommend it to a friend .
customer_reviews.author: Rocio M

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful but Delicate
customer_reviews.text: Loved these shoes so much for about 4 months, and then they started coming apart where the canvas meets the sole of the shoe :( I was so sad...got endless compliments on these babies, they were super cute and subtly eye-catching. I recommend them, just go easy on them.
customer_reviews.author: Jmae535

customer_reviews.title: Exactly like the picture and fit like a glove
customer_reviews.text: Exactly like the picture and fit like a glove. Seem as durable as Keds always were in the past--just an updated look. I really like the sheen on the sole which adds a new dimension. Would recommend. The only reason I did not give 5 stars is the price--much too high.
customer_reviews.author: Mybluemountain

customer_reviews.title: Comfort and Style!
customer_reviews.text: When I opened the box and took out the shoes, at first look I was concern these Keds would be too narrow. But I have to say THEY FIT PERFECTLY! I’m on my feet 5-7 hours when I work, and I am very happy with the comfort as well as the look! Great purchase decision!
customer_reviews.author: Winbindy57

customer_reviews.title: Cutest sneakers ever!
customer_reviews.text: They look adorable and super comfortable to wear. The color is just as shown.
customer_reviews.author: Alejandro D.

customer_reviews.title: Cute, comfortable, and stylish
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love these! Stylish and comfortable! Wish they came in other colors. Very cute!
customer_reviews.author: Mimi Renee

customer_reviews.title: Adorable!!!
customer_reviews.text: These are such a pretty and neutral shade of pink. They for very nicely with no pinching spots. I only wish the laces were just a tiny bit longer.
customer_reviews.author: Danny’s Mom

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love them! the color, the style....they are not heavy at all like others
customer_reviews.author: Moly54

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: love them. But the get dirty easily and they give me blisters on my Achilles
customer_reviews.author: emily richan

customer_reviews.title: Still adorable
customer_reviews.text: Was very cute, but alittle upset that my mother was able to find the same shows for significantly less at a dsw. Still adorable
customer_reviews.author: MelissaGonzalez

product_meta.title: Keds Women's Tpl Kick Shimmer Canvas Pink Trainers
product_meta.description: Lace to toe upper; ortholite footbed, feminine last
feature_bullets: Durable Rubber outsole for added comfort
